landing.hero: Ship fewer bugs. Fix them faster.
landing.heroSubtitle: BugSpark captures screenshots, console logs, network requests, and session data automatically — so your users report better bugs and your team resolves them in record time.
landing.featuresSubtitle: Everything you need to catch and fix bugs faster.
landing.featureScreenshotDesc: Users annotate screenshots directly in the browser. No extra tools needed.
landing.featureConsoleDesc: Automatically capture errors, warnings, and logs leading up to the bug report.
landing.featureNetworkDesc: See failed API calls, slow responses, and request waterfalls at a glance.
landing.featureSessionDesc: Replay the user's journey step-by-step to understand exactly what happened.
landing.featureDeviceDesc: Browser, OS, viewport, and device info collected automatically with every report.
landing.featureWebhooksDesc: Push bug reports to Slack, Jira, Linear, or your own systems in real-time.
landing.widgetDemoSubtitle: A lightweight widget that lives in the corner of your app. Click, annotate, submit.
landing.demoSubtitle: Watch the full bug reporting workflow — from click to submission — in a continuous loop.
landing.demoStep1Desc: A floating button sits in the corner, ready when your users spot something wrong.
landing.demoStep2Desc: One click captures a pixel-perfect screenshot — no extensions needed.
landing.demoStep3Desc: Draw circles, arrows, and highlights to pinpoint the exact problem area.
landing.demoStep4Desc: Add a title, description, and severity. Console logs and device info attach automatically.
landing.demoStep5Desc: Your team gets a rich report with annotated screenshot and full context.
landing.demoDashStep1Desc: The bug report lands in your dashboard with full context.
landing.demoDashStep2Desc: Your team reviews the report and marks it for investigation.
landing.demoDashStep3Desc: The bug gets assigned to the right person with all context they need.
landing.demoDashStep4Desc: Fix shipped. The report is marked resolved with a full audit trail.
landing.demoTypedDesc: Clicking login does nothing on Safari
landing.integrationSubtitle: Add BugSpark to any web app with a single script tag or npm package.
landing.ctaSubtitle: Free and open-source. Self-host or use our cloud. No credit card required.
landing.pricingSubtitle: Start free and scale as you grow. No hidden fees.
landing.pricingTeamDesc: For growing teams that need more power.
landing.pricingEnterpriseName: Need more? Contact us for a custom Business plan.
landing.pricingEnterpriseDesc: Unlimited reports, projects, and seats — plus enterprise features for large organisations.

featuresPage.title: Features
featuresPage.subtitle: Everything you need to catch, understand, and resolve bugs faster than ever.
featuresPage.screenshotDesc: Users annotate screenshots directly in the browser — highlight areas, draw arrows, and add notes. No extra tools or browser extensions needed.
featuresPage.consoleDesc: Automatically capture errors, warnings, info, and debug logs leading up to the bug report. See exactly what the console showed at the time of the issue.
featuresPage.networkDesc: Inspect failed API calls, slow responses, request/response payloads, and full request waterfalls — all captured automatically with every report.
featuresPage.sessionDesc: Replay the user's journey step-by-step with a timeline of clicks, navigations, and interactions. Understand exactly what happened before the bug.
featuresPage.deviceDesc: Browser, operating system, viewport dimensions, screen resolution, language, and timezone — collected automatically with every single report.
featuresPage.webhooksDesc: Push bug reports to Slack, Jira, Linear, GitHub Issues, or your own systems in real-time via webhooks or the REST API.
featuresPage.aiDesc: Let AI categorise bugs, suggest root causes, identify similar issues, and generate reproduction steps — saving your team hours of manual triage.
featuresPage.brandingDesc: Match the bug reporter widget to your brand with custom colours, logos, and text. Your users will never know it's BugSpark.
featuresPage.ctaSubtitle: Get started in minutes. Free forever for individuals.

pricingPage.title: Pricing
pricingPage.subtitle: Start free and scale as you grow. No hidden fees. Cancel anytime.
pricingPage.faqQ1: Can I use BugSpark for free?
pricingPage.faqA1: Yes! The Free plan includes 50 reports per month, screenshot capture, and console logs — perfect for side projects and individual developers.
pricingPage.faqA2: Absolutely. BugSpark is open-source and can be self-hosted on your own infrastructure with unlimited projects, users, and reports.
pricingPage.faqQ3: What payment methods do you accept?
pricingPage.faqA3: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers for annual Enterprise plans.
pricingPage.faqQ4: Can I upgrade or downgrade anytime?
pricingPage.faqA4: Yes. You can change your plan at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately and downgrades apply at the next billing cycle.
pricingPage.faqQ5: Is there a free trial for paid plans?
pricingPage.faqA5: Yes — both Starter and Team plans include a 14-day free trial. No credit card required to start.

aboutPage.title: About BugSpark
aboutPage.subtitle: Built by developers, for developers. Making bug reporting suck less.
aboutPage.missionDesc: We believe that bug reporting should be effortless for users and information-rich for developers. BugSpark bridges that gap by automatically capturing the context developers need — screenshots, console logs, network requests, and session data — so no one has to write "it doesn't work" ever again.
aboutPage.storyDesc: BugSpark started as a side project born from frustration. As developers, we spent countless hours asking users to reproduce bugs, share console screenshots, or describe what they clicked. We built BugSpark to solve this problem once and for all — a lightweight widget that captures everything automatically.
aboutPage.valueOpenSourceDesc: BugSpark is open-source and always will be. We believe in transparency, community contributions, and giving developers full control over their tools.
aboutPage.valueDxDesc: Every feature is designed with developers in mind — from the API to the dashboard to the CLI. If it's not a joy to use, we haven't shipped it yet.
aboutPage.valuePrivacyDesc: Your data stays yours. Self-host for full control, or use our cloud with strict data isolation. We never sell or share user data.
aboutPage.valueSimplicityDesc: One script tag, one dashboard, zero configuration. We obsess over removing complexity so you can focus on building great products.
aboutPage.developerBio: Full-stack developer passionate about developer tools and open-source software. Building BugSpark to make bug reporting painless for everyone.
aboutPage.techDesc: BugSpark is built with modern technologies we love:

changelogPage.title: Changelog
changelogPage.subtitle: All the latest updates, improvements, and fixes to BugSpark.
changelogPage.v030Desc: Added dedicated Features, Pricing, About, and Changelog pages. Updated navigation with smooth animations. Improved enterprise pricing section design. Full i18n support for zh-TW.
changelogPage.v020Desc: Introduced AI-powered bug analysis using Anthropic. Added GitHub Issues export integration. Improved session replay timeline. Added personal access tokens for CLI access.
changelogPage.v010Desc: First public release of BugSpark. Core features: screenshot capture with annotation, console log recording, network request tracking, device metadata collection, project management dashboard, and embeddable widget.
